title: ReactJS Developer
description:
ReactJS Developer Location: San Francisco, CAJob Description:We are looking for
an experienced Front-End Developer with strong background in JavaScript, React,
Redux and other relevant front-end technologies. You will be responsible for the
developing user interface for our business portal for internal and external
users. Qualified candidates will be expected to have a working knowledge of
HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, React, and a basic understanding of user interface and
user experience (UI/UX) design. Your duties will include turning wireframes and
mock-ups into reusable code and building high-quality UI components with
scalability in mind.Responsibilities:Build web applications with web development
best practicesTransform app designs into front-end code with HTML, CSS, and
JavaScript / ReactWork with back-end developers to integrate UI components with
APIs and databasesGather and refine specifications and requirements based on
technical requirements or UX designDebug errors, troubleshoot issues, and
perform routine performance optimizationsWrite high-quality, scalable, and
reusable code. Write unit tests and functional tests.Technical
Skills:JavaScript, React, ReduxHTML5, CSS, Tailwind, Headless Components,
Micro-FrontEndJest, React test libraries, Playwright,Responsive Design skills
that support major browser types and mobile devicesAPI integration with Backend
servicesExperienced with build tools Grunt, Gulp, or Webpack.Familiar with
GitHub, GItHub Actions, JIRAIf interested, Please share below details with
update resume:Full Name:Phone:E-mail:Rate:Location:Visa Status:Availability:SSN
(Last 4 digit):Date of Birth:LinkedIn Profile:Availability for the
interview:Availability for the project:
